<S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> I will <S%H5414>make<s%> you <S%H9512>small<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations;<s%> You are <S%H3966>greatly<s%> <S%H959>despised.<s%>

<S%H518>"Though<s%> you <S%H1361>build<s%> <S%H1361>high<s%> like the <S%H5404>eagle,<s%> <S%H518>Though<s%> you <S%H7760>set<s%> your <S%H7064>nest<s%> <S%H996>among<s%> the <S%H3556>stars,<s%> From <S%H8033>there<s%> I will <S%H3381>bring<s%> you <S%H3381>down,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

<S%H518>"If<s%> <S%H1590>thieves<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to you, <S%H518>If<s%> <S%H7703>robbers<s%> by <S%H3915>night<s%> – O <S%H349>how<s%> you will be <S%H1820>ruined!<s%> – Would they not <S%H1589>steal<s%> [only] until they <S%H1767>had<s%> <S%H1767>enough<s%>? <S%H518>If<s%> grape <S%H1219>gatherers<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to you, Would they not <S%H7604>leave<s%> [some] <S%H5955>gleanings<s%>?
"O <S%H349>how<s%> <S%H6215>Esau<s%> will be <S%H2664>ransacked,<s%> And his <S%H4710>hidden<s%> <S%H4710>treasures<s%> <S%H1158>searched<s%> out!

[They who eat] your <S%H3899>bread<s%> Will <S%H7760>set<s%> an <S%H4204>ambush<s%> for you. <S%H369>(There<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H8394>understanding<s%> in him.)

"Then your <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H1368>men<s%> will be <S%H2865>dismayed,<s%> O <S%H8487>Teman,<s%> In <S%H4616>order<s%> that <S%H376>everyone<s%> may be <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> from the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau<s%> by <S%H6993>slaughter.<s%>

<S%H4480>"Because<s%> of <S%H2555>violence<s%> to your <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> You will be <S%H3680>covered<s%> [with] <S%H955>shame,<s%> And you will be <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%>

"On the <S%H3117>day<s%> that you <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H4480>aloof,<s%> <S%H5048><s%> On the <S%H3117>day<s%> that <S%H2114>strangers<s%> <S%H7617>carried<s%> <S%H7617>off<s%> his <S%H2428>wealth,<s%> And <S%H5237>foreigners<s%> <S%H935>entered<s%> his <S%H8179>gate<s%> And <S%H3032>cast<s%> <S%H1486>lots<s%> for <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> – You <S%H1571>too<s%> were as <S%H259>one<s%> of them.

"Do not <S%H7200>gloat<s%> over your brother's <S%H3117>day,<s%> The <S%H3117>day<s%> of his <S%H5235>misfortune.<s%> And do not <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> over the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> In the <S%H3117>day<s%> of their destruction; Yes, do not <S%H6>boast<s%> <S%H1431><s%> In the <S%H6310>day<s%> of [their] <S%H3117>distress.<s%>

"Do not <S%H935>enter<s%> the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of My <S%H5971>people<s%> In the <S%H3117>day<s%> of their <S%H343>disaster.<s%> <S%H1571>Yes,<s%> you, do not <S%H7200>gloat<s%> over their <S%H9567>calamity<s%> In the <S%H3117>day<s%> of their <S%H343>disaster.<s%> And do not <S%H7971>loot<s%> their <S%H2428>wealth<s%> In the <S%H3117>day<s%> of their <S%H343>disaster.<s%>

"For the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7138>draws<s%> <S%H7138>near<s%> on <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nations.<s%> As you have <S%H6213>done,<s%> it will be <S%H6213>done<s%> to you. Your <S%H1576>dealings<s%> will <S%H7725>return<s%> on your own <S%H7218>head.<s%>

<S%H3588>"Because<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as you <S%H8354>drank<s%> on My <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> will <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H8548>continually.<s%> They will <S%H8354>drink<s%> and <S%H3886>swallow,<s%> And <S%H1961>become<s%> as if they had <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H1961>existed.<s%>

"But on <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H6726>Zion<s%> there will be those <S%H6413>who<s%> <S%H6413>escape,<s%> And it will be <S%H6944>holy.<s%> And the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> will <S%H3423>possess<s%> their <S%H4180>possessions.<s%>

"Then the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> will be a <S%H784>fire<s%> And the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> a <S%H3852>flame;<s%> But the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau<s%> [will be] as <S%H7179>stubble.<s%> And they will <S%H1814>set<s%> them on <S%H1814>fire<s%> and <S%H398>consume<s%> them, So that there will be <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H8300>survivor<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau,<s%>" For the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken.<s%>
